description: Main source file for a Flutter-based TV interface application. Contains the main entry point, data model, UI components for the home screen including hero banner, recommendations, focus/navigation handling, and various widget implementations.

classes.name: HomeData
classes.description: Data model representing the structure of the home screen's JSON data, including title, tags, synopsis, heroPoster URL, and recommendations list.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget that builds the main home UI, including background animation, hero banner, and recommendations. Handles asynchronous loading of data and focus management.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, managing data fetching, focus nodes, background animation, and layout of the home content.

classes.name: _HeroBanner
classes.description: Stateful widget presenting the hero section with background image, zoom/parallax effects, overlaying text, buttons, and search bar.

classes.name: _HeroBannerState
classes.description: State management for _HeroBanner, handling focus, parallax updates, and layout responsiveness.

classes.name: _RecommendationsRow
classes.description: Widget presenting a horizontal list of recommendation posters with edge masks, focus, and scroll handling.

classes.name: _PosterCard
classes.description: Widget displaying an individual recommended item with tilt, focus effects, and image.

classes.name: DirectionalFocusIntent
classes.description: Custom Intent class representing focus movement directions (up, down, left, right) for D-pad navigation.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, launching the TvApp.

methods.name: _loadHome
methods.description: Asynchronous method to load home screen data from JSON asset or external data source.

methods.name: _handleDirectionalFocus
methods.description: Handles focus movement based on D-pad input via focusInDirection API.
